INSERT INTO film(filmno, titlekr, titleen, lan, year, len, summary, restrict, dirno, youtube, url, poster, posterthumb, postersize) VALUES (#{filmno}, #{titlekr}, #{titleen}, #{lan}, #{year}, #{len}, #{summary}, #{restrict}, #{dirno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youtube}, #{url}, #{poster}, #{posterthumb}, #{postersize})
mapper.select: SELECT filmno, titlekr, titleen, lan, year, len, summary, restrict, dirno FROM film ORDER BY filmno
SELECT filmno, titlekr, poster FROM film WHERE ROWNUM - <= 6 ORDER BY filmno DESC
